subject: SSN4111 Simsonn Hs Pro Shifter Problem
description_text:
Good morning, I'm sending the following email to report a malfunction with
my newly purchased transmission. Sometimes during calibration, it detects
the seventh gear position as reverse, while other times it detects neutral
as reverse. It's unusable this way. Is there a way to fix it?

I attach video

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Bonifacino,  Please use the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3, select 7R mode, and perform a full recalibration of all gears. During calibration, shift through the gears in the following order: 1 → 2 → 3 → 4 → 5 → 6 → 7 → R. Once calibration is completed successfully, the device will work properly and switch modes normally.

It's exactly what i have done. But the problem is the same!

I don't know where is trhe problem, but when i'm on the neutral position
the software tell me is in reverse.

Hi Alex Bonifacino,  It’s possible that your shifter is affected by a configuration logic issue. I can help you check this.
